name: Sānguó Shā Online
summary: Legends of the Three Kingdoms – LTK for short – is a Chinese card game based on the Three Kingdoms period of China and the semi-fictional 14th century novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms (ROTK) by Luo Guanzhong.

name: Sānguózhì 4: Chìbì Fēngyún
summary: A beat 'em-up by Cony Soft set in The Records of the Three Kingdoms books.

name: Sānguó: 223
summary: This is a RTS war game about the Three Kingdoms around AD 223 consisting characters such as Zhuge Liang, and Cao Pi and Sun Quan. The game has a series of magical events, to tell the story of that era.

name: Sānguó Qúnyīng
summary: Multiple innovative gameplay modes, one click lossless gameplay, effortlessly building the strongest legion alliance, transforming into guild elites, and competing with the heroes!

name: Sānguó Zhì: Qúnxióng Zhēngbà
summary: San Guo Zhi: Qun Xiong Zheng Ba (The Romance of Three Kingdoms: The Fight Of Heroes' Pleiades) is a unlicensed fighting game in the setting of the Chinese era of Three Kingdoms.

name: Sānguó Zhào Yún Zhuàn Zhī Zònghéng Tiānxià
summary:
San Guo Zhao Yun Zhuan Zhi Zong Heng Tian Xia is the sequal of San Guo Zhao Yun Zhuan, a game based on popular historical figure Zhao Yun during The Three Kingdom period in Chinese history.

It is an action RPG which highlights Zhao Yun’s military career, filled with daring charges and hard-fought victories. Compared to the previous title, the combat system has undergone major upgrades: battles now unfold as large-scale clashes involving multiple factions. Iconic military strategies once confined to books or real-life history — from siege warfare and rescue operations to breakouts, night raids, and psychological tactics — are now fully integrated into the gameplay.

Both in terms of scale and intensity, the action is far more ambitious than before. No longer is the battlefield just a place for chaotic button-mashing; intelligence and strategy are just as important as raw strength. Every decision the player makes influences the course of the game, shaping not only how battles unfold, but also how the story is written.

name: Sānguó Zhī Nù
summary: Orthodox game of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, you will become one leader of a dynasty, to lead legendary generals riding across re-created epic battlefields as thousands of people will capture cities and seize territories.

name: Sānguó Qún Jiàng Zhuàn
summary:
Experience the Epic Three Kingdoms Era in Sanguo Qun Jiang Zhuan!

Embark on an unforgettable journey through ancient China in San Guo Qun Jiang Zhuan, a thrilling strategy RPG where you'll command legendary heroes and build your own empire. Recruit powerful generals, forge unbreakable alliances, and engage in epic battles to conquer the land and establish your dynasty. This is the ultimate Three Kingdoms strategy game you've been waiting for!

name: Sān Guó Qún Yīng Zhuàn
summary: Dive into the epic battles of the Three Kingdoms period with Sān Guó Qún Yīng Zhuàn, a classic strategy game where you'll command armies and conquer territories! Experience the rich history and legendary heroes in this engaging SLG (Simulation Game), perfect for fans of historical warfare and strategic gameplay.
